title: Bandelier National Monument: Cacti / Desert Succulents
body: Cacti and Other Succulents         Some cactus bloom with brilliantly colored flowers. NPS Photo by Sally King  Although in general appearance cactus seem all thorns, when they bloom, what a beautiful sight. Claretcup cactus with their red-orange flowers, Prickly pear with its yellow or sometimes pink blossoms, and Cane Cholla with their hot pink flowers are eye-catching indeed. Many of these succulents were also important to the Ancestral Pueblo people.
